mapper.insert: insert into tbl_category_nav (categorynav_id, categorynav_no, categorynav_name, categorynav_status, categorynav_ctime) values (#{categorynavId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{categorynavNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{categorynavName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categorynavStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{categorynavCtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select categorynav_id, categorynav_no, categorynav_name, categorynav_status, categorynav_ctime from tbl_category_nav
select * from tbl_category_nav where categorynav_status=1 order by categorynav_no asc limit 0,7
